!News Informer: A new tune can be heard from the depths of the Emperor's Tomb. Frintezza's new arrangement has made his minions much stronger than they were. Only veterans |level 84 or above should even think about entering the Emperor's Tomb. A good place to get started is by completing the quest Four Goblets and go from there. [npc_%objectId%_Link Announcer/update_announcer001.htm|Talk about something else.]
